about.title: About Us
about.description: We are a trusted Indonesian vanilla exporter committed to delivering the highest quality vanilla beans worldwide. With decades of experience in sustainable farming and global distribution, we ensure every bean meets international standards.

organic.title: Organic Quality
organic.description: Certified organic vanilla beans grown without harmful chemicals

planifolia.title: Vanilla Planifolia
planifolia.description: Premium grade vanilla planifolia beans with rich aroma and intense flavor

tahitensis.title: Vanilla Tahitensis
tahitensis.description: Exotic vanilla tahitensis with floral notes and tropical fragrance

powder.title: Vanilla Powder
powder.description: Ground vanilla powder perfect for baking and cooking

globalReach.title: Global Reach
globalReach.description: Shipping can be done to all countries worldwide with safe delivery and guaranteed product quality preservation until it reaches the destination country.
